        Checks if browsers run on a local machine. -DisLocal=true
        Returns:

      • localServer

        public static boolean localServer()
        Checks if Selenium grid is running as a localhost server.

        Default to http://127.0.0.1:8080/. -DlocalServer=true

        Returns:
        true, if local server is available, otherwise false.

      • assumeLocalServer

        public static void assumeLocalServer()
